<a id="EditorResourcePicker"></a>

# EditorResourcePicker

**Inherits:** [HBoxContainer](HBoxContainer.md) **\<** [BoxContainer](BoxContainer.md) **\<** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [EditorScriptPicker](EditorScriptPicker.md)

Redot editor's control for selecting [Resource](Resource.md) type properties.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This [Control](Control.md) node is used in the editor's Inspector dock to allow editing of [Resource](Resource.md) type properties. It provides options for creating, loading, saving and converting resources. Can be used with [EditorInspectorPlugin](EditorInspectorPlugin.md) to recreate the same behavior.

\ **Note:** This [Control](Control.md) does not include any editor for the resource, as editing is controlled by the Inspector dock itself or sub-Inspectors.

## Signals

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_signal_resource_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**resource_changed**\ (\ resource\: [Resource](Resource.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_signal_resource_changed)

Emitted when the value of the edited resource was changed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_signal_resource_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**resource_selected**\ (\ resource\: [Resource](Resource.md), inspect\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_signal_resource_selected)

Emitted when the resource value was set and user clicked to edit it. When `inspect` is ``true``, the signal was caused by the context menu "Edit" or "Inspect" option.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_property_base_type"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **base_type** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_property_base_type)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_base_type**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_base_type**\ (\ )

The base type of allowed resource types. Can be a comma-separated list of several options.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_property_editable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **editable** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_property_editable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_editable**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_editable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the value can be selected and edited.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_property_edited_resource"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Resource](Resource.md) **edited_resource** [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_property_edited_resource)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_edited_resource**\ (\ value\: [Resource](Resource.md)\ )
- [Resource](Resource.md) **get_edited_resource**\ (\ )

The edited resource value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_property_toggle_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **toggle_mode** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_property_toggle_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_toggle_mode**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_toggle_mode**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the main button with the resource preview works in the toggle mode. Use [set_toggle_pressed()](EditorResourcePicker.md#EditorResourcePicker_method_set_toggle_pressed) to manually set the state.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_private_method__handle_menu_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **_handle_menu_selected**\ (\ id\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_private_method__handle_menu_selected)

This virtual method can be implemented to handle context menu items not handled by default. See [_set_create_options()](EditorResourcePicker.md#EditorResourcePicker_private_method__set_create_options).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_private_method__set_create_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_set_create_options**\ (\ menu_node\: [Object](Object.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_private_method__set_create_options)

This virtual method is called when updating the context menu of **EditorResourcePicker**. Implement this method to override the "New ..." items with your own options. `menu_node` is a reference to the [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) node.

\ **Note:** Implement [_handle_menu_selected()](EditorResourcePicker.md#EditorResourcePicker_private_method__handle_menu_selected) to handle these custom items.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_method_get_allowed_types"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedStringArray](PackedStringArray.md) **get_allowed_types**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_method_get_allowed_types)

Returns a list of all allowed types and subtypes corresponding to the [base_type](EditorResourcePicker.md#EditorResourcePicker_property_base_type). If the [base_type](EditorResourcePicker.md#EditorResourcePicker_property_base_type) is empty, an empty list is returned.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="EditorResourcePicker_method_set_toggle_pressed"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_toggle_pressed**\ (\ pressed\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#EditorResourcePicker_method_set_toggle_pressed)

Sets the toggle mode state for the main button. Works only if [toggle_mode](EditorResourcePicker.md#EditorResourcePicker_property_toggle_mode) is set to ``true``.
